member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.CleanPackagesDirectoryRequest.SubDirectoryToDelete
member.summary: if is not set root directory 'packages' and subfolders are cleaned. If it is set then specified sub directory is cleaned 'Pacakges\{UploadToSubDirectory}'.

member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.CleanReportsDirectoryRequest.SubDirectoryToDelete
member.summary: if is not set root directory 'Reports' and subfolders are cleaned. If it is set then specified sub directory is cleaned 'Reports\{UploadToSubDirectory}'.

member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.DownloadReportsRequest.DownloadFromSubDirectory
member.summary: if is not set whole root directory 'reports' on flubu server is packaged into zip and downloaded. If it is set then reports in specified subdirectory are zipped and downloaded 'Reports\{DownloadFromSubDirectory}'.

member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.UploadPackageRequest.DirectoryPath
member.summary: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search. This string is not case-sensitive.

member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.UploadPackageRequest.PackageSearchPattern
member.summary: The search string to match against the names of files in DirectoryPath.This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (such as * and ?) characters, but doesn't support regular expressions.

member.name: P:FlubuCore.WebApi.Model.UploadPackageRequest.UploadToSubDirectory
member.summary: if is not set it is uploaded to the root directory 'packages'. If it is set then package is uploaded to specified sub directory 'Pacakges\{UploadToSubDirectory}'.

member.summary: Path to the script file to be uploaded.
